idea-plugin.name: Problem4AI
idea-plugin.description:
Problem4AI is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin that automatically collects compilation errors and warnings from your project, and generates AI-friendly prompts for quick fixes.

Features

  • Automatically collect project compilation errors and warnings
  • Categorized display (Errors/Warnings)
  • Click to navigate to problem location
  • One-click copy to generate AI fix prompts
  • Integrated into IDE Problems panel
